create_database: CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS test;
create_tables: CREATE TABLE Restaurants (RestaurantID INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, RestaurantName VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, Location VARCHAR(255), PRIMARY KEY (RestaurantID));

CREATE TABLE Menus (MenuID INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, MenuName VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, RestaurantID INT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (MenuID), FOREIGN KEY (RestaurantID) REFERENCES Restaurants(RestaurantID));

CREATE TABLE Dishes (DishID INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, DishName VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, Price DECIMAL(10,2), MenuID INT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (DishID), FOREIGN KEY (MenuID) REFERENCES Menus(MenuID));
CREATE TABLE Customers (CustomerID INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, FirstName VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, LastName VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (CustomerID));

CREATE TABLE Orders (OrderID INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, CustomerID INT NOT NULL, RestaurantID INT NOT NULL, OrderDate DATETIME NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (OrderID), FOREIGN KEY (CustomerID) REFERENCES Customers(CustomerID), FOREIGN KEY (RestaurantID) REFERENCES Restaurants(RestaurantID));

delete: DELETE FROM Restaurants WHERE RestaurantID = 1;
DELETE FROM Restaurants WHERE RestaurantName = 'Bistro Cafe';
DELETE FROM Restaurants WHERE Location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM Restaurants WHERE RestaurantID > 5;
DELETE FROM Restaurants WHERE Location = 'Chicago' AND RestaurantName LIKE 'Pizza%';

DELETE FROM Restaurants WHERE RestaurantName LIKE '%Grill';
DELETE FROM Restaurants WHERE Location = 'Los Angeles' OR Location = 'San Francisco';
DELETE FROM Restaurants WHERE RestaurantName = 'Sushi Place' AND Location = 'Seattle';

single_filtering: SELECT RestaurantID FROM Restaurants WHERE Location = 'New York';
SELECT MenuID FROM Menus WHERE MenuName = 'Lunch Menu';
SELECT DishID FROM Dishes WHERE Price = 10.00;
SELECT OrderID FROM Orders WHERE CustomerID = 1;
double_filtering: SELECT RestaurantID FROM Restaurants WHERE Location = 'New York' AND RestaurantName = 'Central Perk';
SELECT MenuID FROM Menus WHERE MenuName = 'Lunch Menu' AND RestaurantID = 1;
SELECT DishID FROM Dishes WHERE Price = 10.00 AND MenuID = 2;
SELECT OrderID FROM Orders WHERE CustomerID = 1 AND RestaurantID = 1;
triple_filtering: SELECT RestaurantID FROM Restaurants WHERE Location = 'New York' AND RestaurantName = 'Central Perk' AND RestaurantID = 1;
SELECT MenuID FROM Menus WHERE MenuName = 'Lunch Menu' AND RestaurantID = 1 AND MenuID = 2;
SELECT DishID FROM Dishes WHERE Price = 10.00 AND MenuID = 2 AND DishID = 3;
SELECT OrderID FROM Orders WHERE CustomerID = 1 AND RestaurantID = 1 AND OrderDate = '2024-09-01';
range_filtering: SELECT RestaurantID FROM Restaurants WHERE RestaurantID BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT MenuID FROM Menus WHERE MenuID BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT DishID FROM Dishes WHERE Price BETWEEN 5.00 AND 15.00;
SELECT OrderID FROM Orders WHERE OrderID BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
ranking: SELECT RestaurantID FROM Restaurants ORDER BY RestaurantID ASC;
SELECT MenuID FROM Menus ORDER BY MenuID DESC;
SELECT DishID FROM Dishes ORDER BY Price ASC;
SELECT OrderID FROM Orders ORDER BY OrderDate DESC;
double_table: SELECT Restaurants.RestaurantID FROM Restaurants JOIN Menus ON Restaurants.RestaurantID = Menus.RestaurantID;
SELECT Menus.MenuID FROM Menus JOIN Dishes ON Menus.MenuID = Dishes.MenuID;
SELECT Orders.OrderID FROM Orders JOIN Restaurants ON Orders.RestaurantID = Restaurants.RestaurantID;
SELECT Orders.OrderID FROM Orders JOIN Customers ON Orders.CustomerID = Customers.CustomerID;
three_table: SELECT Orders.OrderID FROM Orders JOIN Restaurants ON Orders.RestaurantID = Restaurants.RestaurantID JOIN Customers ON Orders.CustomerID = Customers.CustomerID;
SELECT Dishes.DishID FROM Dishes JOIN Menus ON Dishes.MenuID = Menus.MenuID JOIN Restaurants ON Menus.RestaurantID = Restaurants.RestaurantID;
SELECT Menus.MenuID FROM Menus JOIN Restaurants ON Menus.RestaurantID = Restaurants.RestaurantID JOIN Dishes ON Menus.MenuID = Dishes.MenuID;
SELECT Orders.OrderID FROM Orders JOIN Restaurants ON Orders.RestaurantID = Restaurants.RestaurantID JOIN Customers ON Orders.CustomerID = Customers.CustomerID;
